backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles and daily fitness entries with access control, blob storage integration, and CRUD operations for entries sorted by date.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest describing a glowing-button animation feature with affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend React files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styling for borders and background.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app with dark mode preset and mounts the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, theme enforcement, and global toast configuration.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: About page component displaying app information using cards, icons, and a back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard rendering charts for weight, body fat, measurements, and workout data using React Query and Recharts.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders the main calendar with indicators for days that have saved content and opens detail or comparison views.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Provides camera access with zoom, lens preference, and error handling to capture photos.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty or missing file content; no functionality shown.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Header component for compare slots showing selected date, relative day offset, and a button to open a date picker.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailsInline: Shows a compact inline summary of a day's measurements with variance compared to today.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a single day's measurements, workouts, and photo, supporting photo capture/upload and navigation.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Defines the app's top-level layout and navigation between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Enables side‑by‑side comparison of photos from three dates with variance indicators and slot‑based date selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a new user profile, handling name, gender, and unit selection, and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: Profile settings page allowing users to view and edit their saved profile, update fields, and log out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and daily entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark modes and includes custom styles for calendar indicators and toast overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a branded login page with feature highlights and a login button tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Provides functions to normalize camera-related errors into consistent, user-friendly categories.
Implements heuristics to prefer a standard rear camera lens, with environment checks and graceful fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Detects PWA installation state and Android Chrome environment for specialized behavior.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Contains utilities for date/time conversion, formatting, and calculating day variances and offsets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, including metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests.
